video_prompt: Futuristic armored woman's cape trails, sword glows, casting light on city. Streaks of energy flash across the night sky, buildings subtly illuminate. Her expression shifts, subtle, as she subtly re-positions.
image_prompt: Full-body, high-angle hyperrealistic 3D render/cosplay photo of a futuristic armored female. She has light bobbed hair, subtle makeup, and light blue eyes. Her sleek grey and black hexagonal armor has red/orange accents, a cropped top, thigh-high boots, and gloves. She holds a horizontally glowing white sword that illuminates her. A dark cape trails behind her. Background: Dark night cityscape with silhouetted skyscrapers, glowing windows, and bright light streaks.
refined_video_prompt: An armored woman's cape dynamically trails. Her sword pulses with light, illuminating the surrounding city as energy streaks rapidly flash across the night sky. Background buildings subtly gain and lose illumination. Her facial expression gently shifts, reflecting an evolving internal state, as she subtly re-positions her stance.
